10. Row 9: winner on October 26, 2008 in Port Pirie, hard vs Yurika Sema, 6-3 6-4. Not our date.
11. Row 10: runner-up on November 15, 2008 in Pune, hard against Lu Jingjing, score 3-6 2-6. No match.
12. Finally, row 11: runner-up on October 25, 2009 in Glasgow, hard vs Johanna Larsson, with the exact score of 1-6 6-1 3-6.

Wait a second, that matches both the date (October 25, 2009) and the score (1-6 6-1 3-6). So this row in the table shows exactly what the claim states. Therefore, the claim is TRUE.
</think>

The claim is TRUE because there is an entry in the table that matches both the specified date and score.
